questions.quote: Uh, that's him. He just came home. ... Uh, the door [Jerry pushes his door against Kramer's entrance]
He claims that you followed him home, and started harassing him.
Every woman on the face of the earth has complete control of my life. And yet, I want them all.. is that irony?
What, he can't jump out of the chair? How long does that take? Here look at this.  Here, watch.  Criminals. Boom. I'm up.  Stop It! Stop It! Stop It!
Yes. With a little guidance, Steven Koren is going to be everything I claim to be, only for real. That's my dream, Jerry.
Y'know, just because you two are homosexuals, so what? I mean you should just come out of the closet and be openly gay already.
All right, forget that idea, it's not for you....Okay, okay, I got it. You run an antique store.
So she sees you with hot fudge on your face and she ends it? You really think she would be that superficial?
Oh, no, not just me, the whole organization. Especially Mr. Morgan.
I don't return fruit. Fruit is a gamble. I know that going in.
